ERROR_CREATE_ATTRIBUTE: An error occurred while creating the attribute
ERROR_CREATE_ATTRIBUTE_VALUE: An error occurred while creating the attribute value

ERROR_ARRANGE_ATTRIBUTE_VALUES: An error occurred while ordering attribute values
ATTRIBUTE_VALUES_LENGTH_DOES_NOT_MATCH: The number of attribute values does not match

ERROR_CHECK_ATTRIBUTE: An error occurred while validating the attribute

ERROR_REMOVE_ATTRIBUTE_VALUE: An error occurred while deleting the attribute value

ERROR_GET_ATTRIBUTES: An error occurred while retrieving the attribute

ERROR_GET_ATTRIBUTE_VALUES: An error occurred while retrieving the attribute values
